items.title: AI Company to Pay Authors $1.5 Billion in Settlement
items.description: Anthropic agrees to pay authors big bucks in settlement over pirated works, fall's most anticipated new releases, and more.

items.title: Award-Winning THE LIBRARIANS Documentary Sets Widespread Release
items.description: The award-winning documentary THE LIBRARIANS, which explores contemporary book bans and attacks on librarians, to release nationwide.

items.title: Book Riot’s Deals of the Day for September 8, 2025
items.description: A pair of 2025 new releases, a cutting work of satire, a king desperate to become cake, and more of today's best book deals.

items.title: 4 Exciting September Book Releases, BIPOC Edition
items.description: September has come out swingin'! Look forward to: an Arundhati Roy memoir, new Nathan Harris, the first Cherokee astronaut, and more.

items.title: It’s Basically Cozy Season, Right? I Think So.
items.description: It may not officially be fall yet, but if it's cozy time in your soul, here are six cozy books by BIPOC authors to curl up with now.
